synopsis.text: Market ed as an independent anime project by Nosferatu, this captivating film was first screened at the Mini-Cinema Tollywood in Tokyo's Shimo-Kitazawa, Setagaya district, from August 21, 2010. The film's protagonist, Non-chan, is a humanoid monkey shrouded in bandages, giving him the eerie appearance of a mummy. One day, Non-chan encounters a turtle being tormented at the beach and gallantly comes to its rescue, causing the bullies to flee in fear. Grateful for his intervention, the turtle invites Non-chan to escape this land filled with bullies and embark on a journey together. The turtle promises to wait for Non-chan's decision until the following day. As Non-chan heads to the beach the next day, he stumbles upon an unexpected discovery. In addition to its theatrical release, a DVD containing the complete edition of the anime was made available for purchase at Tokyo's Comic Market 78 on August 15, 2010.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
